inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil, black crayon and black ink: various notes and inscriptions
markings: on back, stamped in black and red: two crossed-out red text stamps, red artist's stamp and [SNARK INTERNATIONAL / 47 RUE VIVIENNE  PARIS 2]
signed: on back, in black ink: [Mario Giacomelli * 64]
title: Pretini (Priests)
